column17:
Valentino Rock n Rose Eau de Parfum - 90 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3575

The Rock n Rose from the house of Valentino Garavani is a metaphor for the young woman of the rock generation. A curious mix of floral fruity and woody notes the fragrance is both delicate and stern in turns symbolizing the spirit of youthfulness and rebellion. Blatant and vibrant in its overwhelming touch the Rock n Rose embraces your senses in gentle provocative flirtation and seduces with its suggestive undertones.

Launched in 2006 by perfumer Francoise Caron the Valentino Rock n Rose luxury perfume is not just a soliflore as the name implies but brings more from the bouquet than just sweet roses. The very first waft of the Eau de Parfum encircles you in a blast of Black Currant and Bergamot which gradually makes way for quieter and softer floral aromas of Orange Blossom Gardenia Lily of the Valley and Rose. The dry down brings out a fresh summery warmth with the bright notes of Sandalwood Musk Vanilla Orris Root and Heliotrope. Rich and luxuriant the exquisite rose-tinted perfume is intensely sensuous and feminine in its expression and is perfectly packaged in an elegantly designed spherical glass vial making it a classy choice for the sophisticated new age woman.
